title: Fear on Film - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/4/22
itunes:title: Fear on Film - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/4/22
description:
George Noory and author Chris Alexander explore the continued popularity of horror films, especially during times of upheaval in the world, and discuss the scariest horror movies ever and some of their most famous stars.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
